description:
When temperatures plummet and conditions turn unpleasant in the mountains, the Eigerjoch Pro Hooded Jacket is the ideal companion for expeditions, winter bivouacking or belaying on ice climbs. The Eigerjoch Pro is an extra-warm insulated jacket for bitter-cold and extreme conditions. It offers protection you can depend on and an impressive set of clever features.

The Pertex® Quantum Pro material on the outside of the jacket is ultra-light and extra abrasion-resistant at the same time. An additional water-repellant treatment offers extra protection in extreme conditions.Premium goose down compliant with the Responsible Down Standard coupled with the innovative double chamber construction keep you nice and warm and make sure there aren’t any cold spots. For even better protection against moisture, the jacket has partially taped seams and is made with water-repellant down treated and combined with PrimaLoft™ synthetic fiber insulation made from recycled polyester. Finally, there are plenty of other convenient features and pockets as well as a separate stuff sack.
name: Mammut Eigerjoch Pro IN Hooded Jacket - Mens
